ComicInfo.Summary: This month's offering includes our regular MASQUE feature written & illustrated by Mark Badger, another great CONCRETE story by Paul Chadwick, and we proudly present MR. MONSTER in his very first solo story for Dark Horse Comics, written and drawn by Michael T. Gilbert, preluding his regular monthly series!
ComicInfo.Tags: Larry Munro,Mr. Monster,The Mask (Dark Horse),Concrete,Maureen Vonnegut
ComicInfo.Title: Now Is Now; Gone Fishing! (Part 5); His World; Tails
